subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Montreal coach Bob Gainey’s decision to combine Alex Tanguay, Alex Kovalev and Saku Koivu on the top line paid off for the Canadiens, who snapped a five-game losing streak with a 6-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers.
snippet: Montreal coach Bob Gainey’s decision to combine Alex Tanguay, Alex Kovalev and Saku Koivu on the top line paid off for the Canadiens, who snapped a five-game losing streak with a 6-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers.
